title: Korean leaders hope for a new start at historic talks
text:
Korean leaders hope for a new start at historic talks 9:11am BST - 01:54
 meet at the heavily fortified demilitarized zone between the countries on Friday, pledging to pursue peace after decades of conflict. WIth handshakes and smiles, the scene was a big contrast from serious tensions just a year ago. meet at the heavily fortified demilitarized zone between the countries on Friday, pledging to pursue peace after decades of conflict. WIth handshakes and smiles, the scene was a big contrast from serious tensions just a year ago. //reut.rs/2I3EupF
